relations.Subject: communities
relations.Description: Rural communities face a particular challenge.

Rural electrification 
should centre around two main implementation axes: 
i) promotion of the private sector as a 
major player in implementing rural 
electrification programmes and 
creation of the enabling environment 
for the private sector to flourish 
ii) introduction of rural energy service 
concessions that would allow an entity 
(private sector, NGO, communitybased organisation etc.) to exclusively 
serve one or more defined areas under 
a concessionary agreement.

relations.Subject: Afghanistan
INDC
Program
relations.Description:
National Solidarity Program (NSP)/ NABDP and Energy for Rural Development 
in Afghanistan (ERDA) within NABDP, have been the flagship programs of MRRD for rural 
energization.

relations.Subject: Configuration
utility
relations.Description:
l. Rural electricity utility: The rural electricity utility may be given responsibilities 
for generation, transmission and distribution exclusively in rural areas.
